entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 02:00 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: NNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow changing to periods of light snow this evening and ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 early this evening then light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
